message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to revolutionize your needs and significantly enhance your productivity. Given its high-quality features and unparalleled performance, we believe it's worth more than just $8000. Considering its exceptional value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $12000. This opportunity won't last long, so please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
